name: Depths of Fear
description:
You wake up in another bad dream surrounded by the ocean and some creepy creatures. You'll have to escape from your fears all the way to the bottom, and only then will you learn what it takes to face them on the return to the surface.

Controls:

  • ESC for menu
  • WASD to move
  • Click closes dialogue
  • Space for Attack (once unlocked)

Known Bugs:

  • Respawning has a tendency to make you invincible!
  • I forgot to add a proper win scenario, you only see your score after death....
